channel.title: Pi revival method in minigames?
channel.description:
Ok so i was remaking the whole pest control for pi with shifters and void knight all i need to know is where is the correct file i can add the dead method like i can do a switch case method or if statement like if player in c.pestcontrol If players dies c.moveplayer (coords) and not delete their items on death
So what i tried well i checked the applydead method in playerassistant.java but im not exactly sure where to add it

item.title: Pi revival method in minigames?
item.dc:creator: @Dextrell Dextrell
item.description:
@Dextrell wrote:

Ok so i was remaking the whole pest control for pi with shifters and void knight all i need to know is where is the correct file i can add the dead method like i can do a switch case method or if statement like if player in c.pestcontrol
If players dies c.moveplayer (coords) and not delete their items on death

So what i tried well i checked the applydead method in playerassistant.java but im not exactly sure where to add it
